assignments.name: Set_disclosure_assigned_to_PRC_Meeting
assignments.label: Set disclosure assigned to PRC Meeting

decisions.name: Has_the_disclosure_already_been_assigned_to_a_PRC_meeting
decisions.label: Has the disclosure already been assigned to a PRC meeting?

decisions.name: Is_Current_Hierarchy_User_the_Owner_of_the_PRC_Meeting_Record
decisions.label: Is Current Hierarchy User the Owner of the PRC Meeting Record?

Flow.description:
PRC to PRB Name change Done.
Removed Disclosure Status for PRB under Review in "Set disclosure assigned to PRC Meeting" assignment
Change PRC naming defaults/convention to [PRB Technology Area] [YYYY-MM-DD] (i.e., remove "PRC-" prefix, remove time suffix, and remove dash between PRB and date) - 22/6/20
Chenged value for PRB Review Scheduled - 09/07/2020
Disclosure Status set as Ready for PRB Review after the PRB meeting deleted - 29/06/2023
Added PRB Technology Area in Screen(Screen Reviewer), Added PRB Technology Area in Screen(Added to PRB Meeting)-05/07/2023

formulas.name: fRecommendationsSummary
formulas.expression: "File:" + TEXT({!vFileCount}) + " | Reject:" + TEXT({!vRejectCount}) + " | Hold:" + TEXT({!vHoldCount}) + " | Trade Secret:" + TEXT({!vTSCount}) + " | Defensive Publication:" + TEXT({!vDPCount})

Flow.label: Add to PRB Meeting

fields.name: assignedPRCMeetingDetails
fields.fieldText:
This Disclosure has been assigned to the following PRB Meeting.


Meeting Name: {!sAssignedPRCMeeting.Name}

Date: {!sAssignedPRCMeeting.SymphonyIPM__Meeting_Date__c}

Time: {!sAssignedPRCMeeting.SymphonyIPM__Start_Time__c}

Time Zone: {!sAssignedPRCMeeting.Time_Zone__c}

Location: {!sAssignedPRCMeeting.SymphonyIPM__Location__c}


To delete the current PRB Meeting assignment and assign to a new PRB Meeting, click Next.

validationRule.errorMessage: Enter the start time in the specified format of HH:MM.

fields.name: ErrorPrbTech
fields.fieldText: You are not allowed to select this technology.

fields.name: PRC_Meeting
fields.fieldText:
PRB Meeting


This Disclosure has been assigned to the following PRB Meeting.


Meeting Name: {!sAssignedPRCMeeting.Name}

Date: {!sAssignedPRCMeeting.SymphonyIPM__Meeting_Date__c}

Time: {!sAssignedPRCMeeting.SymphonyIPM__Start_Time__c}

Time Zone: {!sAssignedPRCMeeting.Time_Zone__c}

Location: {!sAssignedPRCMeeting.SymphonyIPM__Location__c}
